mdRecord.dcterms:title: Farm report, work done on the Mount Vernon farms during week 14-20 March 1790.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George Augustine, approximately 1759-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Meteorological Account of the weather at Mount Vernon -- work done on each farm, giving division of labor -- work days lost by sickness -- stock increase and decrease for each farm -- work of ditchers, coopers, joiners and carpenters -- amount of grains ground at mill. Includes "lathing and shingling the shed of the Barn Yard." Autograph document, in hand of G.A. Washington, docketed, watermark (ILG). | Papers of George Washington - Reel#2
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799
